definition: erhua variant of 雜拌|杂拌[za2 ban4]
variant of 雜|杂[za2]
mixed/miscellaneous/various/to mix
to mix/to mix in/to toss (a salad)
variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc
child/son
non-syllabic diminutive suffix/retroflex final

sentences.chinese: 那是一种光怪陆离的杂拌儿。

pastry/steamed bun/cake

sponge cake (light steamed flour or rice cake)
fried glutinous rice dough cake
glutinous rice cake with a sweet filling
one Jiao coin (Mao, one-tenth of yuan)
malt sugar candy, a traditional offering to the kitchen god Zaoshen 灶神
(coll.) hen's egg
